availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Marion W. Dodds (caldwell co. student / resident )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, student and resident. Kentucky native. Son of David S. Dodds and Elizabeth Dodds. Married to Celestine Brelsford Dodds in Crittenden County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1862. Student in Caldwell County in 1850. Resident in Caldwell County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 290B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Crittenden County Marriages, Film #000558428, p. 215-16.
"Francis Marion Dodds (1834-1911)," Find A Grave, Memorial #121425024, accessed June 17, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/121425024.
KYR-0001-020-0037.
